issue.title: [R] strftime bindings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13666](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13666). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Create bindings for `strftime`, now that ARROW-13174 has been merged.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13666?focusedCommentId=17401199) by Ian Cook (icook):*
We should also see if it would be straightforward to also implement `format_ISO8601()` from lubridate, and maybe some of the format functions from the clock package: https://clock.r-lib.org/reference/index.html
